title: Jade Black with Artisanal Aari Embroidery Work Super Soft Premium Cotton Designer Shirt
story_description:
Story Discover the epitome of style and luxury with our Jade Black Designer Shirt. Made from super
soft premium cotton, this exquisite shirt boasts artisanal Aari embroidery, meticulously crafted by
skilled artisans. The intricate details and handcrafted embellishments add a touch of elegance and
sophistication, making it a true statement piece for any occasion. Experience unparalleled comfort
and impeccable craftsmanship as you indulge in the luxurious feel of the fabric against your skin.
With its timeless appeal and exceptional quality, this Jade Black Designer Shirt is a must-have
addition to your wardrobe. Shop now and elevate your style to new heights.

title: Jade Black with Tropical Blue Multicolour Striped Premium Tencel Shirt
story_description:
Story Strut in style in this tropical tencel shirt from French Crown. Pure tencel twill fabric
gives this classic shirt a luxurious feel. Regular fit, with a button-down front leading from the
collared neck with long cuffed sleeves for a smart finish. This unique bright colourful striped
shirt from French Crown comes out for grabs while stocks last.
description:
Strut in style in this tropical tencel shirt from French Crown. Pure tencel twill fabric gives this
classic shirt a luxurious feel. Regular fit, with a button-down front leading from the collared neck
with long cuffed sleeves for a smart finish. This unique bright colourful striped shirt from French
Crown comes out for grabs while stocks last.Tencel Fabric: It is a form of rayon. It consists of cellulose fibre, made from dissolving pulp and
then reconstituting it by dry jet wet spinning.  A sustainable fabric because it is made from
sustainable sources and therefore it is biodegradable. It can be blended with other fabrics.
Limited quantity, Seasonal collection. We change our fashion very frequently. Grab it before it
disappears
Tencel weave; Gentle on skin, Color retention, long lasting softness, Flexible Versatile

ultra-premium certified West Indian Sea Island Cotton from Barbados, it has the perfect combination

produced each year.

Story A unique staple every corporate range needs is this solid Nutmeg Brown shirt by French Crown.
Crafted using regular-fit from a lightweight slight sheen-cotton material which offers unrestricted
comfort, this full-sleeved shirt will be your go-to whether heading to a party or formal evening
dos. Merge it with light-coloured slim-fit chinos and polished loafers to look dapper.

title: Periglacial Green Subtle Sheen Super Soft Premium Cotton Shirt
story_description:
Story Wondering what to wear for your next formal gathering? Get your hands on this amazing solid
Green shirt from French Crown. With its smooth, lustrous fabric, it gives off a luxurious shine,
making it perfect for special occasions. The rich green colour gives the shirt a classic and
timeless look, making it a versatile piece that can be paired with a variety of styles and colours.
The slight sheen material blended with pure cotton is soft to the touch, providing a comfortable
feel all day long, making it perfect for events that require you to be dressed up for long hours.
Whether you're attending a formal event, a wedding, or a night out on the town, this shirt is a
must-have in your wardrobe.

story_description:

Twill: Twill is made by weaving twin horizontal threads under and over vertical threads to create a
distinctive diagonal pattern. Twill fabric is soft and thick, resistant to creases and easy to iron.
It also drapes very well, producing a smart result.
Medium weight fabric. Made for all climates.

Flannel: Flannel is a soft, medium-weight cotton fabric that has a napped, fuzzy, finish on one or
both sides. This napped finish either comes from brushing or from its characteristic loose weave.
Its soft, cozy feel makes it the perfect fabric to keep you warm and comfortable all winter long.
It’s often woven with patterns, especially plaid and tartan, and is a favorite fabric for sheets
during the winter.
Medium weight fabric, ideal for all climates.

Premium mother-of-pearl buttonsHerringbone: Also called broken twill weave, describes a distinctive
V-shaped weaving pattern usually found in twill fabric. It is distinguished from a plain chevron by
the break at reversal, which makes it resemble a broken zigzag. The pattern is called herringbone
because it resembles the skeleton of a herring fish.Medium weight fabric, Made for all climates.
Herringbone: Also called broken twill weave, describes a distinctive V-shaped weaving pattern
usually found in twill fabric. It is distinguished from a plain chevron by the break at reversal,
which makes it resemble a broken zigzag. The pattern is called herringbone because it resembles the
skeleton of a herring fish.
Medium weight fabric, Made for all climates.

jacquard weave; Jacquard weave is created using a specific loom designed to produce patterned
fabrics. Using a mix of different weaves, the possibilities of patterns are endless. A simple
geometric pattern like a dot, or window pane, to a complex paisley can be created. Jacquards are
great way to add a very subtle pattern to your style. Jacquards can be made one color or a mix of
colors to create even more complex patterns. Often the back side of a jacquard is the mirror image
of the pattern. We suggest Jacquard shirts for: any occasion to promote your personal style!
Medium weight fabric. Made for all climates.

great way to add a very subtle pattern to your style. Jacquards can be made one color or a mix of
colors to create even more complex patterns. Often the back side of a jacquard is the mirror image

Flannel: Flannel is a soft, medium-weight cotton fabric that has a napped, fuzzy, finish on one or
both sides. This napped finish either comes from brushing or from its characteristic loose weave.
Its soft, cozy feel makes it the perfect fabric to keep you warm and comfortable all winter long.
It’s often woven with patterns, especially plaid and tartan, and is a favorite fabric for sheets
during the winter.
Medium weight fabric, ideal for all climates.

jacquard weave; Jacquard weave is created using a specific loom designed to produce patterned
fabrics. Using a mix of different weaves, the possibilities of patterns are endless. A simple
geometric pattern like a dot, or window pane, to a complex paisley can be created. Jacquards are
great way to add a very subtle pattern to your style. Jacquards can be made one color or a mix of
colors to create even more complex patterns. Often the back side of a jacquard is the mirror image
of the pattern. We suggest Jacquard shirts for: any occasion to promote your personal style!

title: Jade Black Luxurious Linen Shirt
story_description:
Story In our minds, there’s no situation in which you can‘t wear a linen shirt. There are times,
however, when a pure cotton wears a bit too warm. Our solution: the cotton and linen Blend. This
cotton and linen blend we developed with our favorite Portuguese mill breathes incredibly well while
retaining the substantial feel of a classic Chambray weave. The fabric has a bit of slub from the
linen which gives it beautiful texture and character, and it’s more durable and opaquer than most
cotton/linen blends, too.
description:

the substantial feel of a classic Chambray weave. The fabric has a bit of slub from the linen which
gives it beautiful texture and character, and it’s more durable and opaquer than most cotton/linen
blends, too.

title: Bright white Indian Kurta Style Luxurious Linen Shirt
story_description:
Story This 40s single-ply fabric has a particular heft to it that you don’t often find in linen,
putting it firmly at the intersection of substantial and breathable. Layer it under sweaters and
sport coats in spring and fall, or in place of a white dress shirt to add some interest and texture.
It gives a nonchalant yet refined impression to a casual look. A beautiful and understated Indian
casual to bolster your warm weather wardrobe.

distinctive diagonal pattern. Twill fabric is soft and thick, resistant to creases and easy to iron.
It also drapes very well, producing a smart result.

title: Jade Black Royal Oxford Designer Shirt
story_description:
Story Introducing the ultimate wardrobe staple for outdoor enthusiasts and fashion-forward men
alike - the Jade Black Designer Shirt from French Crown. Made with thick and warm fabric, this shirt
is perfect for casual evenings or outdoor activities, providing both comfort and style. Featuring a
designer pattern, this shirt features two flap pockets at the front and is sure to make a statement.
Whether you're exploring the great outdoors or simply enjoying a night out with friends, this
designer Shirt is the perfect addition to your wardrobe.
